description: Given a line segment and a point P, this returns the point on the segment that is closest to P. Note: This function will return A or B if P is beyond these two points.
*ðŸš© This documentation is for the IW3 version of this function credit to Raid Gaming and has yet to be reviewed/updated for IW4.*

params.name: segment A
description: One endpoint of the line segment.

params.name: segment B
description: Other endpoint of the line segment.
